analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/5/0x22b7eea5e111f6563fec76f65fa4da1985b41035.sol:
	Contract LTRToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0x22b7eea5e111f6563fec76f65fa4da1985b41035.sol#163-164)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/5/0x22b7eea5e111f6563fec76f65fa4da1985b41035.sol:
